ygData.subject: Re: Back to the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson narrows his eyes.  He turns sharply to Kup. Then all the more reason to return the favor.  Kup, when Rodimus was in his right mind, you did not give up

Tucson narrows his eyes.  He turns sharply to Kup.

"Then all the more reas=
on to return the favor.  Kup, when Rodimus was in his right mind, you did n=
ot give up on his beliefs.  I respect you, I always will, but when it came =
to me trying to suggest something out of the box, you called it wrecklessne=
ss and something that shouldn't be attempted.  Truth is, Hydras and Percept=
or are onto our old school method of doing things, truth is, IT'S TIME TO T=
HINK OUTSIDE THE PROVERBIAL BOX!"

He had never yelled at Kup, and most cer=
tainly did not mean it, but something was building inside him.  Something h=
e had not shown even to Kup in fear that he may disrespect his old friend. =
 But things were different, and in order to fight innovation one must embra=
ce it.  He was indeed ready to embrace innovation.  He paces vigorously as =
the energon flows into his system.

" Nothing is impossible Kup, nothing.  =
I'm most certainly not giving up on Rodimus or Nightlight.  And I'm not goi=
ng to let Hydras get away with this!  It's time we showed them that the Aut=
obots are not extinct yet!  IT'S TIME TO TRANSFORM AND ROLL OUT!"  

His vo=
ice at the last statement, mirrors that of old Optimus Prime, who always sa=
id those words when it was time to go into battle.

All the time, his outbu=
rst occurs right beside the fallen body of his old leader.

--- In nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Kup:
> 
> Kup took an Sleepy Eli=
ta and said softly "I'm close enought to Rodimus to assure that he wouldnt =
be easy to reprogram as Predacon in normal circuntances, but when the matri=
x was captured... It's hard to explain... Nightlight jsut was a bait... it =
isnt the frist time that hydras capture her.... When Elita was a baby, Hydr=
as snatched her from inside the base... a maximal died tried to rescue her =
but we failed... she was reprogramed then and I should admit it, Perceptor =
did an excellent job"said with bitterness Kup"She almost died when we repro=
gramed her back to her maximal original program"and looking to elita  he ad=
ded "After the matrix were captured, she again disappeared this time Hydras=
 used a posed maximal to lure her out our sight... We knew that she had dis=
apeared cause she always gives Elita her good night kiss, she never have mi=
ssed it... Rodimus ran outside the base looking for her and he disappeared =
too; I guess that Hydras took advantage of Rodimus's emotional status to br=
eak him... We had just loose the battle and we didnt pay attention when the=
y have vanished"
> 
> Kup Shook his head "I told you, Tucson, once we get t=
hem out side the BlackFortress wotn be easy to reprogram them back to Maxim=
al... I almost Willing to force Perceptor to tell us what kind of locks he =
had done even it that mean to forget all Maximals and Autobots protocols"
>=
 
> 
> 
> From: Sandy 
> Sent: Monday, March 15, 2010 9:18 PM
> To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: Back to the Ark
> 
> 
>   
> Tucson nodds a=
nd opens an energy port leading directly into his left wrist. 
> 
> "Yes, t=
hat sounds good Lord Elder. Here, this will make it easy to administer the =
energon." 
> 
> He takes a seat near everyone but especially near Elita. Ro=
dimus and Nightlight were already taken from her and he was not about to le=
t her fall into the same fate. Her sadness to him is a torture he felt she =
did not deserve. She had done nothing to no one and in return was suffering=
 a great deal. This angers him yet he tries desperately to hold back his el=
evating temper. He cracks his knuckles to try and calm himself down althoug=
h at this point, he didn't know if he could ever calm down.
> 
> "As if the=
 battle between us and Unicron wasn't enough. Now Hydras, Cyclonus and Scou=
rge have to go on a meaningless power trip and torment innocent Autobots an=
d Maximals without rime or reason. I know if Rodimus were in his right mind=
, he would not tolerate it, and certainly not Optimus. As far as I heard fr=
om what I learned while at the fortress, Cyclonus is feeding off the power =
of the Matrix which is in Rodimus's body. That's what's making him stronger=
. Well, guess what? I'm prepared to cut that umbilcal cord no matter how mu=
ch it damages my own spark. I learned something about self worth. What am I=
 worth? How can I be worth something when there are lives just starting out=
 there that are more precious than my own? And how can I say I'm worth some=
thing when we have young aspiring Autobots and Maximals just starting their=
 careers as soldiers? They have their whole lives ahead of them, and by Pri=
mus I'm prepared to give back what's been taken from them, THEIR FREEDOM!"
=
>
